metadata.title: CVE-2020-14212 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: FFmpeg through 4.3 has a heap-based buffer overflow in avio_get_str in libavformat/aviobuf.c because dnn_backend_native.c calls ff_dnn_load_model_native and a certain index check is omitted.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.3.1-1ubuntu1').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
